comment: /**  * Adds a data set as a broadcast set to the compute function.  *  * @param name The name under which the broadcast data set is available in the compute function.  * @param data The data set to be broadcast.  */
code: /**  * Adds a data set as a broadcast set to the compute function.  *  * @param name The name under which the broadcast data set is available in the compute function.  * @param data The data set to be broadcast.  */ public void addBroadcastSet(String name, DataSet<?> data) {     this.bcVars.add(new Tuple2<>(name, data)). }

comment: /**  * Get the broadcast variables of the compute function.  *  * @return a List of Tuple2, where the first field is the broadcast variable name  * and the second field is the broadcast data set.  */
code: /**  * Get the broadcast variables of the compute function.  *  * @return a List of Tuple2, where the first field is the broadcast variable name  * and the second field is the broadcast data set.  */ public List<Tuple2<String, DataSet<?>>> getBcastVars() {     return this.bcVars. }
